title: Decentralized Grid Trading
summary: Decentralized grid trading is a concept implemented on the Ergo blockchain that allows for automated trading orders while maintaining user control over funds. Two notable implementations are Off the Grid and Machina Finance. Off the Grid is a decentralized application that automates order matching using a grid trading contract. Machina Finance is developing a decentralized exchange that utilizes grid order contracts.

sections.heading: Overview
sections.content:
Decentralized grid trading is a powerful concept implemented on the Ergo blockchain. It allows for automated trading orders while ensuring users maintain control over their funds. Two notable implementations of this concept are the Off the Grid and Machina Finance projects.

Learn more about grid trading on [Investopedia](https://www.investopedia.com/terms/g/grid-trading.asp).

sections.heading: [Off the Grid](off_the_grid.md)
sections.content: Off the Grid is a decentralized application (dApp) that builds on the grid trading contract proposed by kushti. It includes an execution bot/batcher for automating order matching without user interaction.

sections.heading: [Machina Finance](machina-finance.md)
sections.content: Machina Finance is another project on Ergo that is exploring the concept of grid trading. It is developing a decentralized exchange (DEX) that utilizes grid order contracts.
